title: ACI Reactivation Protocol - From Blackout to Verified Perception
executive_intent: Reality before learning. Learning before capital.

three_gated_layers.rule: No layer may advance without verified integrity of the previous

phase_a_data_reality.sql_evidence_query: SELECT canonical_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_price, NOW() - MAX(timestamp) AS staleness FROM fhq_market.prices WHERE canonical_id IN ('SPY','GLD','BTC-USD','SOL-USD') GROUP BY canonical_id

actions: Run IoS-010 scoring WITHOUT updating model weights
phase_b_perception_sanity.objective: Confirm that observations are real, not that performance is good
phase_b_perception_sanity.rollback_rule: Any unexpected discontinuity -> automatic rollback to DATA_BLACKOUT

clearance_requirements: Price freshness invariant holds for >= 2 hours
No epistemic anomalies in Phase B
CEIO preventive control is live and verifiable
upon_clearance: FINN allowed to resume regret attribution

explicit_prohibitions: No paper trading during Phase A or B
No calibration gate adjustment during reactivation

strategic_note.observation: This blackout was not a failure. It was the first successful self-detection of epistemic blindness.
strategic_note.value: That capability is rarer - and more valuable - than short-term alpha.

standing_order: Reality before learning. Learning before capital.

closing_statement.text: ACI Reactivation Protocol implemented. System awaiting CEIO price restoration and post-mortem. Three-phase gated reactivation ready. No layer advances without verified integrity of the previous.
